body:
• Achewood - February 3, 2006
    "He was like the Thomas Edison of handing a dude his ass."
    (tags: comics funny)
  • DETROIT BRINGS 'EM BACK: Like tourists in own town, suburbanites gape at view
    "Many parents used the Motown Winter Blast as an opportunity to show their children the city for the first time." Now, let's see how long this lasts after the Super Bowl.
    (tags: detroit superbowl tourism)
  • The Wisdom of Parasites. The Loom: A blog about life, past and future
    Attack of the Pod Roaches
    (tags: insects biology neuroscience cogsci)
  • The Adventures of Dr. McNinja
    He's a doctor, he's a ninja, he's Irish. It's like The Tick meets pirate-vs-ninja. I wish it had an RSS feed.
    (tags: comics nifty)
  • smb_super_synth.swf (application/x-shockwave-flash Object)
    It's a Super Mario Bros soundboard! With sprites from the game as sound buttons

  • PHP: create_function - Manual
    "Creates an anonymous function from the parameters passed, and returns a unique name for it." It's meta, Jim, but not as we know it...
